anaestesia.definition:
Is the animal under anaesthesia (true) or
         awake (false)?

anaesthetic_dose.definition: The dose of the used anaesthetic.

bath_solution.definition: The solution the slice is bathed in.

bath_temperature.definition: The temperature of the bath solution.

description.definition: A textual description of the preparation.

local_anaesthesia.definition: Was there some local anaesthesia applied (true or false).

local_anaesthetic.definition:
The drug that was used for local
         anaesthesia.

local_anaesthetic_dose.definition: The dose of the used local anaesthetic.

local_anaesthetic_location.definition: Describes the place the local anaesthetic was applied.

ringers_solution.definition: The Ringer solution used during preparation.

slice_orientation.definition: The slice orientation: horizontal, sagital etc.

slicing_method.definition: How was the brain sliced: Microtome etc.

solution_flow_speed.definition: The flow speed of the bath solution.
